Name: Cyberception
About the game: Cyberception is a single player FPS set in dystopian, cyberpunk world. The Main Guy is set to find person responsible for killing his friend. Along the way he discovers a major conspiracy to strip citizens of Mega City from the ability to make their own decisions. Cyber - corporate conglomerate - runs around the clock to finalize their plan to stream thoughts and desires directly to citizens neuro-chips - devices, integrated directly to the central nervous system, loved by virtually everyone because of the how convenient it makes one daily life. Classic, fast-paced, first person shooter game-play fused with thrilling story and elements of parkour that gives players new ways to dominate enemies.
